summary: Add MAX_TODO_TEXT_LENGTH validation to prevent unbounded memory consumption
validation_points: Todo.__post_init__ validates text length on direct instantiation
Todo.rename() validates text length with clear error message
Todo.from_dict() validates text length for deserialization
TodoApp.add() validates text length for CLI input
Error message shows actual length and limit for debugging
acceptance_criteria_met: Todo.rename() raises ValueError if text exceeds max length
Todo.from_dict() raises ValueError if text exceeds max length
TodoApp.add() raises ValueError if text exceeds max length
